text: December Boys is a 2007 Australian movie. It was directed by Rod Hardy and written by Marc Rosenberg. It was taken from the 1963 novel of the same name by Michael Noonan. It was released on 14 September 2007 in the UK and US and 20 September 2007 in Australia. December Boys is Daniel Radcliffe's first non- Harry Potter movie role since 2001's The Tailor of Panama. == References == Category:2007 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Australian drama movies Category:Australian romance movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in the 1960s Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: December Boys
